special.title: Get $250 on FanDuel Sportsbook
special.body:
Sign up using this [referral link]({referral_link}), deposit ${deposit}, and place any winning bet with that ${deposit} to qualify!

You will then receive ${earnings} in bonus bets from FanDuel.

My recommendation:
1. Place the original ${deposit} deposit on a high-odds bet to keep your money safe (look for bets that are -10000 and lower, these can easily be found in the “alternate total points” section of games).
2. With the ${earnings} in bonus bets, split it evenly between 2 opposing in any matchup. This way, no matter what happens, you guarantee a profit.
3. Once your bets settle, you can cash out and walk away with your free money :)

default.title: Referral code for ${earnings} in bonus bets
default.body:
Referral link: {referral_link}

The only terms are that you must deposit ${deposit} and make any bet. After that you will be awarded ${earnings} in bonus bets on top of the new customer offer!
